author: SegmentLinking
body: #### PR description: This PR reshapes the object creation loop logic of LST T3 and T5 kernel. The new logic avoids introducing many early stop threads, which would be idle due to a thread divergence cut. This increases active threads per warp by 3 times, thus leading to a reduction in T3 and T5 object building time. This PR also deduces repeating codes from T3 building. #### PR validation: This is a purely computational optimization. Validation has been performed to prove that the physics performance doesn't change. Timing improvement can be seen from T3 and T5 kernels from single stream to multi-streams. single stream sees the most improvement.
title: Reshape LST T3 and T5 building kernels in LST to increase the active threads per warp
